pkgmetadata.longdescription: Translate 'iatgen' Generated QSF Files // Automates translating the instructions of 'iatgen' generated qsf (Qualtrics survey files) to other languages using either officially supported or user-supplied translations (for tutorial see Santos et al., 2023 doi:10.17504/protocols.io.kxygx34jdg8j/v1).
